Episodes.Title: Ep. #1
Episodes.Plot:
The first ever episode of Days of Our Lives opens with Julie and some of her friends entering Bartlett's department store. They slowly walk to a display case and take a fur out of the case. The shop has been the victim of robberies in the recent weeks and security wasn't taking any chances. As Julie and her friends are about to leave, security stops them...
*Hourglass opening*
Julie and her friends are in the police station being questioned. However instead of Julie giving her real last name (Ol
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert J. Stevenson, Geraldine Lawrence, Simone Pascal

Episodes.Title: Ep. #2
Episodes.Plot: The police release Julie to Tom. Julie feels bad about shoplifting and refuses to see Ben and Addie, so Marie tries to comfort her.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ep. #3
Episodes.Plot: Ben argues with Mickie about how to handle Julie. Addie and Ben pick up Julie from Tom's. Meanwhile, Tony flies to Boston.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ep. #4
Episodes.Plot: Ben and Addie get to see the security tape of Julie's shoplifting incident, and punish Julie thereafter. Julie begs Steve to help her run away, but he is reluctant to do so. Meanwhile, Tony has a dizzy spell.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ep. #5
Episodes.Plot: Tony's dizzy spells continue, as do Ben and Mickey's fights over Julie.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ep. #6
Episodes.Plot: Marie and Addie argue. Jim begins to worry about Tony after he has another dizzy spell. Tom confides in Carl that he has an ulcer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ep. #7
Episodes.Plot: Tony finally goes to a doctor for his dizzy spells, and the doctor is confused by Tony's blood work. Julie has her first hearing in the shoplifting case.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ep. #8
Episodes.Plot: Tony is informed of his rare blood disease, causing him to reconsider his wedding. Meanwhile, Marie and Alice make wedding plans, unaware of Tony's diagnosis.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ep. #9
Episodes.Plot: Tony gets drunk and refuses to return to Salem, worried about telling his fiancee about his condition. However, he confides in Jim, who promises to keep it a secret. Marie talks about the wedding with Tom and Craig, and Mickey decides that Julie might ought to move out.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ep. #10
Episodes.Plot: Following Mickey's suggestion, Julie moves in with Alice and Tom. Tony comes home from Boston and tells Craig that he can't get married.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
